title: Sri Lanka v England: Hosts win to take 2-0 lead in one-day series
content: Second one-day international, Colombo (RPS): Sri Lanka 186-2 (34.2 overs) beat England 185 (43 overs) by eight wickets Sri Lanka beat England by eight wickets in a rain-reduced one-day international to take a 2-0 lead in the series….
